message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to buy this amazing product from me. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. This is a great deal, considering its worth $1000000 to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, considering the product's value to me. Can you consider my offer?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm not quite ready to accept $850000. I'm willing to compromise and offer you a price of $875000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you and my initial offer. What do you think?
I understand your compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $862500. Can you consider this revised offer?

I understand your hesitation, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I'm not willing to go below $870000. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment and offer you a price of $867500. This is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you and my initial offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable going above $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $856250. Can you consider this revised offer?

I understand your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I'm not willing to go below $860000. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment and offer you a price of $859000. This is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you and my initial offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable going above $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $853500. Can you consider this revised offer?

I understand your position, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $855000. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment and offer you a price of $854000. This is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you and my initial offer. What do you think?

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I've reached my limit. I'm willing to meet you halfway one last time and offer $851000. If you're not willing to accept this, I'll have to consider buying the product from John for $1000000. Can you consider this revised offer?
